item.title: Fixing 'unable to install the EFI boot loader' when installing PVE
item.description:
This article is translated from Chinese to English by ChatGPT. There might be errors.

I recently bought a small J1900 mini PC to give to a friend as a soft router. As usual, I tried to install Proxmox on it, but ran into an issue Iâ€™d never seen before: when the progress bar reached 100%, it threw this error: failed to prepare EFI boot using Grub on '/dev/sda2': unable to install the EFI boot loader on '/dev/sda'. I then spent the whole afternoon wrestling with it before finally fixing the problem.
